ofx:section.ofx:paragraph:
Download the Java Development Kit (JDK) - not only the basic Java Runtime Environment (JRE) - from the following web site
http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html.
Please select the x86 (32 bit) or x64 (64 bit) version depending on your Windows environment. To figure out which version of Windows you are running please press the Windows key plus Pause to get to the system information screen. There you will find the information on which architecture (32 or 64 bit) your Windows version is made for. If you are unsure use the x86 version, it should work fine on both. After downloading the installation package please launch it and follow the setup wizard.
